MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 postcode area of Newtown, affecting properties in Tregynon and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.34PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair broken pieces of equipment on our overhead line network  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.44PM on 4th February 2021.
